elements.label: A Human Corpse
elements.description: The spirit is departed. At some point, the smell will be so bad you'll have to dispose of it, but here it is for now. It may attract attention; it may be used to impress the impressionable. [Even after the Corpse is gone, Notoriety will remain.]
elements.comments: The xtriggers for raising are no longer relevant if we have corpse.calcin, but keeping them in for unexpected execution paths.

elements.label: Scarred Bone-Fragment
elements.description: Within this fragment lie memories of an older Hour.

elements.label: Leathery Remnant
elements.description: Sense-memories and longings, the secrets of the Knot, in an unpromising scrap of old self.

elements.label: Long-Flake
elements.description: Very little remains, but the taste - the unheralded taste -

elements.label: Shadowless Segment
elements.description: Did the Kings ever know true Glory?

elements.label: Wolfshead
elements.description: Did she know the Sun as it was?
